title: Digital Action Receipt (DAR)
description: Non-authoritative JSON Schema for the Digital Action Receipts (DAR) core payload. The normative definition is provided in dar-core.md.

dar_version.description: Version of the DAR core specification.

action_type.description: A string identifying the category or class of the digital action.

action_id.description: A unique identifier for the digital action.

timestamp.description: RFC 3339 timestamp representing when the action reached its commit point.

type.description: The class of actor responsible for the action.

id.description: An opaque identifier for the actor.

inputs_hash.description: A cryptographic hash referencing the inputs associated with the action.

outcome_hash.description: A cryptographic hash referencing the outcome or result of the action.

signature.description: Optional cryptographic signature asserting issuance authenticity.
